post.author: 강재형
post.content:
source : http://www.flipdog.com/



DesTech is always interested in hearing from professionals of the highest calibre and integrity who are looking for a challenging career. Our clients expect not only exceptional Oracle skills but strong communication and interpersonal skills.

DesTech is currently looking for new people to join our team in the positions listed below.

• Senior Oracle Developers/Analysts

• Oracle Database Administrators

• Oracle Instructors

Office Location 69 Yonge St. Toronto
Status Permanent Full-time positions
Work Area Greater Toronto Area
Job Location Consultants usually work at client sites, Instructors teach at head office
Salary Commensurate with skills established by interview and testing process
Benefits Attractive package paid by employer


Skill Developer DBA
SQL Required Required
PL/SQL Required Desirable
Oracle Forms Required  
Oracle Reports Required  
Oracle Designer Desirable  
Application Tuning Required Required
JAVA Desirable  
Database Design Required Required
Database Tuning   Required
Database Backup/Recovery   Required
UNIX Desirable Required
Team Leadership Required Required


Skill Developer Instructor DBA Instructor
SQL Required Required
PL/SQL Required Required
Oracle Forms Required  
Oracle Reports Required  
Oracle Designer Desirable  
Application Tuning Required Required
JAVA Desirable  
Database Design Required Required
Database Tuning   Required
Database Backup/Recovery   Required
UNIX Desirable Required
Team Leadership Required Required


Please forward resumes to:

DesTech Consulting and Education
69 Yonge Street, Suite 1200
Toronto, Ontario M5E 1K3
Attn: Human Resources

Fax: (416) 368-6524
Email: careers@destech.com
post.title: Oracle -DBA/Developer
